verses.verse: And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and spake<WG2036> unto them<WG846> again<WG3825> by<WG1722> parables,<WG3850> and said,<WG3004>
The <WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is like unto<WG3666> a certain king, <WG444> <WG935> which <WG3748> made<WG4160> a marriage<WG1062> for his<WG848> son. <WG5207>

And <WG2532> sent forth<WG649> his<WG848> servants<WG1401> to call<WG2564> them that were bidden<WG2564> to<WG1519> the<WG3588> wedding: <WG1062> and<WG2532> they would<WG2309> not<WG3756> come. <WG2064>

Again, <WG3825> he sent forth<WG649> other<WG243> servants,<WG1401> saying,<WG3004> Tell<WG2036> them which are bidden,<WG2564> Behold,<WG2400> I have prepared<WG2090> my<WG3450> dinner: <WG712> my<WG3450> oxen<WG5022> and<WG2532> my fatlings<WG4619> are killed,<WG2380> and<WG2532> all things<WG3956> are ready: <WG2092> come<WG1205> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> marriage. <WG1062>

But <WG1161> they<WG3588> made light of<WG272> it, and went their ways,<WG565> one <WG3588> <WG3303> to <WG1519> his<WG2398> farm, <WG68> <WG1161> another <WG3588> <WG3303> to <WG1519> his<WG848> merchandise: <WG1711>
And <WG1161> the<WG3588> remnant<WG3062> took<WG2902> his<WG846> servants,<WG1401> and entreated them spitefully,<WG5195> and<WG2532> slew<WG615> them.

But <WG1161> when the<WG3588> king<WG935> heard<WG191> thereof, he was wroth: <WG3710> and<WG2532> he sent forth<WG3992> his<WG848> armies,<WG4753> and destroyed<WG622> those<WG1565> murderers,<WG5406> and<WG2532> burned up<WG1714> their<WG846> city. <WG4172>

Then <WG5119> saith<WG3004> he to his<WG848> servants,<WG1401> The<WG3588> wedding <WG1062> <WG3303> is <WG2076> ready,<WG2092> but<WG1161> they which were bidden<WG2564> were<WG2258> not<WG3756> worthy. <WG514>

Go <WG4198> ye therefore<WG3767> into<WG1909> the<WG3588> highways, <WG1327> <WG3598> and <WG2532> as many as <WG3745> <WG302> ye shall find,<WG2147> bid<WG2564> to<WG1519> the<WG3588> marriage. <WG1062>

So <WG2532> those<WG1565> servants<WG1401> went out<WG1831> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> highways,<WG3598> and gathered together<WG4863> all<WG3956> as many as<WG3745> they found,<WG2147> both<WG5037> bad<WG4190> and<WG2532> good: <WG18> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> wedding<WG1062> was furnished<WG4130> with guests. <WG345>

And <WG1161> when the<WG3588> king<WG935> came in<WG1525> to see<WG2300> the<WG3588> guests,<WG345> he saw<WG1492> there<WG1563> a man<WG444> which had not on <WG1746> <WG3756> a wedding<WG1062> garment: <WG1742>

And <WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> Friend,<WG2083> how<WG4459> camest<WG1525> thou in hither<WG5602> not<WG3361> having<WG2192> a wedding<WG1062> garment?<WG1742> And<WG1161> he<WG3588> was speechless. <WG5392>

Then <WG5119> said<WG2036> the<WG3588> king<WG935> to the<WG3588> servants,<WG1249> Bind<WG1210> him<WG846> hand<WG5495> and<WG2532> foot,<WG4228> and take him away, <WG142> <WG846> and <WG2532> cast<WG1544> him into<WG1519> outer<WG1857> darkness;<WG4655> there<WG1563> shall be<WG2071> weeping<WG2805> and<WG2532> gnashing<WG1030> of teeth. <WG3599>
For <WG1063> many<WG4183> are<WG1526> called,<WG2822> but<WG1161> few<WG3641> are chosen. <WG1588>
Then <WG5119> went<WG4198> the<WG3588> Pharisees,<WG5330> and<WG2532> took<WG2983> counsel<WG4824> how<WG3704> they might entangle<WG3802> him<WG846> in<WG1722> his talk.<WG3056>

And <WG2532> they sent out<WG649> unto him<WG846> their<WG848> disciples<WG3101> with<WG3326> the<WG3588> Herodians,<WG2265> saying,<WG3004> Master,<WG1320> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> thou art<WG1488> true,<WG227> and<WG2532> teachest<WG1321> the<WG3588> way<WG3598> of God<WG2316> in<WG1722> truth,<WG225> neither<WG2532> <WG3756> carest<WG3199> thou<WG4671> for<WG4012> any<WG3762> man: for<WG1063> thou regardest<WG991> not<WG3756> the<WG1519> person<WG4383> of men.<WG444>
Tell <WG2036> us<WG2254> therefore,<WG3767> What<WG5101> thinkest<WG1380> thou?<WG4671> Is it lawful<WG1832> to give<WG1325> tribute<WG2778> unto Caesar,<WG2541> or<WG2228> not?<WG3756>
But <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> perceived<WG1097> their<WG846> wickedness,<WG4189> and said,<WG2036> Why <WG5101> tempt<WG3985> ye me,<WG3165> ye hypocrites? <WG5273>
Show <WG1925> me<WG3427> the<WG3588> tribute<WG2778> money. <WG3546> And<WG1161> they<WG3588> brought<WG4374> unto him<WG846> a penny.<WG1220>
And <WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Whose <WG5101> is this<WG3778> image<WG1504> and<WG2532> superscription? <WG1923>

They say<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> Caesar's.<WG2541> Then<WG5119> saith<WG3004> he unto them,<WG846> Render <WG591> therefore<WG3767> unto Caesar<WG2541> the things<WG3588> which are Caesar's;<WG2541> and<WG2532> unto God<WG2316> the things<WG3588> that are God's. <WG2316>
<WG2532> When they had heard<WG191> these words, they marveled,<WG2296> and<WG2532> left<WG863> him,<WG846> and went their way.<WG565>
The same<WG1565> day<WG2250> came<WG4334> to him<WG846> the Sadducees,<WG4523> which say<WG3004> that there is<WG1511> no<WG3361> resurrection,<WG386> and<WG2532> asked<WG1905> him,<WG846>

saying, <WG3004> Master,<WG1320> Moses<WG3475> said,<WG2036> If<WG1437> a man<WG5100> die,<WG599> having<WG2192> no<WG3361> children,<WG5043> his<WG848> brother<WG80> shall marry<WG1918> his<WG846> wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> raise up<WG450> seed<WG4690> unto his<WG848> brother.<WG80>

Now <WG1161> there were<WG2258> with<WG3844> us<WG2254> seven<WG2033> brethren:<WG80> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> first,<WG4413> when he had married a wife,<WG1060> deceased,<WG5053> and,<WG2532> having<WG2192> no<WG3361> issue,<WG4690> left<WG863> his<WG848> wife<WG1135> unto his<WG848> brother: <WG80>
Likewise <WG3668> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> also,<WG2532> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> third,<WG5154> unto<WG2193> the<WG3588> seventh.<WG2033>
And <WG1161> last<WG5305> of all<WG3956> the<WG3588> woman<WG1135> died<WG599> also.<WG2532>
Therefore <WG3767> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> whose<WG5101> wife<WG1135> shall she be<WG2071> of the<WG3588> seven?<WG2033> for<WG1063> they all<WG3956> had<WG2192> her.<WG846>

<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Ye do err,<WG4105> not<WG3361> knowing<WG1492> the<WG3588> Scriptures,<WG1124> nor<WG3366> the<WG3588> power<WG1411> of God. <WG2316>

For <WG1063> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> they neither<WG3777> marry,<WG1060> nor<WG3777> are given in marriage,<WG1547> but<WG235> are<WG1526> as<WG5613> the angels<WG32> of God<WG2316> in<WG1722> heaven. <WG3772>

But <WG1161> as touching<WG4012> the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> of the<WG3588> dead,<WG3498> have ye not<WG3756> read<WG314> that which was spoken<WG4483> unto you<WG5213> by<WG5259> God,<WG2316> saying, <WG3004>

I <WG1473> am<WG1510> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of Abraham,<WG11> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of Isaac,<WG2464> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of Jacob<WG2384> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> the God<WG2316> of the dead,<WG3498> but<WG235> of the living. <WG2198>
And <WG2532> when the<WG3588> multitude<WG3793> heard<WG191> this, they were astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his<WG846> doctrine.<WG1322>
But <WG1161> when the<WG3588> Pharisees<WG5330> had heard<WG191> that<WG3754> he had put the Sadducees to silence,<WG5392> <WG3588> <WG4523> they were gathered<WG4863> together.<WG1909> <WG846>
Then <WG2532> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> them,<WG846> which was a lawyer,<WG3544> asked<WG1905> him a question, tempting<WG3985> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> saying,<WG3004>
Master, <WG1320> which<WG4169> is the great<WG3173> commandment<WG1785> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> law?<WG3551>

<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Thou shalt love<WG25> the Lord<WG2962> thy<WG4675> God<WG2316> with<WG1722> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> heart,<WG2588> and<WG2532> with<WG1722> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> soul,<WG5590> and<WG2532> with<WG1722> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> mind. <WG1271>
This <WG3778> is<WG2076> the first<WG4413> and<WG2532> great<WG3173> commandment. <WG1785>
And <WG1161> the second<WG1208> is like unto<WG3664> it,<WG846> Thou shalt love<WG25> thy<WG4675> neighbor<WG4139> as<WG5613> thyself. <WG4572>
On <WG1722> these<WG5025> two<WG1417> commandments<WG1785> hang<WG2910> all<WG3650> the<WG3588> law<WG3551> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> prophets. <WG4396>
While <WG1161> the<WG3588> Pharisees<WG5330> were gathered together,<WG4863> Jesus<WG2424> asked<WG1905> them,<WG846>
saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> think<WG1380> ye<WG5213> of<WG4012> Christ?<WG5547> whose<WG5101> son<WG5207> is<WG2076> he? They say<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> The son of David.<WG1138>
He saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> How <WG4459> then<WG3767> doth David<WG1138> in<WG1722> spirit<WG4151> call<WG2564> him<WG846> Lord,<WG2962> saying, <WG3004>

The <WG3588> LORD<WG2962> said<WG2036> unto my<WG3450> Lord,<WG2962> Sit<WG2521> thou on<WG1537> my<WG3450> right hand,<WG1188> till<WG2193> I make<WG5087> thine<WG4675> enemies<WG2190> thy<WG4675> footstool? <WG5286> <WG4228>
If <WG1487> David<WG1138> then<WG3767> call<WG2564> him,<WG846> Lord,<WG2962> how<WG4459> is<WG2076> he his<WG846> son? <WG5207>

And <WG2532> no man<WG3762> was able<WG1410> to answer<WG611> him<WG846> a word,<WG3056> neither<WG3761> durst<WG5111> any<WG5100> man from<WG575> that<WG1565> day<WG2250> forth ask<WG1905> him<WG846> any more<WG3765> questions.
